ygData.subject: Re: grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: Personnaly try solusek sometime I swear to god we got trained on so many times by jerks *mutters millificents name* well there was antoher power leveling guild
ygData.messageBody:
Personnaly try solusek sometime I swear to god we got trained on so many
times by jerks *mutters millificents name* well there was antoher power
leveling guild but wasnt nearly as strong as us they had 5 members but theey
loved to run in right when we were fighting the kobold champion with 5 other
greater kobs (level 40 mob and champ is like 45) when we were level 40 or so
and sk then train more on us....we needed lotsa casters the best combo is
the 4 different casters together we would make a group like that and we would
be in charge wed get the enchanter to take like 5 things out with his
memorize spells then wed just blast verything (it was great we get mad xp)and
wizard was great with his dmg..A wizard was always welcome in my group.
